Planner plan: 1. Use the device ID 6c645f61-0b82-235f-e476-8a6afc0e73dc to check the current phase of the dish washing cycle.
2. Execute the capability custom.dishwasherOperatingProgress to get the current progress of the dishwashing cycle.

4. Optionally, execute dishwasherOperatingState to get the current operational state of the dishwasher.
Planner notes: The dishwasher has capabilities that allow us to check its current operating progress, percentage completed, and operational state. This will provide a comprehensive view of the current phase of the dishwashing cycle. If any of these commands fail, we can try the others to gather the necessary information.
